works.name: WORK IN PROGRESS- React Photo Uploader 1.0
works.description: This app allows the user to upload a photo, alter the photo using the editor, revert to previous alertations, and reset the photo
works.features: react, DropZone, react-avatar-editor, photo editing, uploading, webpack, yarn

works.name: Random Quote Generator
works.description: A simple JavaScript page connected to a json api. The app delivers two types of quotes, and allows the user to tweet the quote.
works.features: JSON API, Twitter functionality, Front-End, Ajax, Jquery

works.name: Gilligan
works.description: A place for boat lovers to book and offer boat rides. This was the final prjoect at Bitmaker.
works.features: MVC, Authentication, Action-Mailer, BootStrap, Google Maps API, Ajax

works.name: Directory of Fake Artists
works.features: Templating JSON, Partials, MVC, JS Modules, Controllers, Data Binding, Routing, Using Services
works.description: Project created to display JSON data in a single-page app with a nice UI.

works.name: Crowdfunder
works.description: Very basic clone of Kickstarter. This project was created and built in only three days. It lacks features since its purpose is mostly to showoff what can be accomplished in a short time. .

works.name: Bulletin Board
works.description: Clone of application 'Stickies'. This is the project I built as I began to learn React.
works.features: Rendering Component Props, React-Specific Methods, ES6, Virtual DOM

works.name: Business Card Maker
works.description: User creates a business card through a form
works.features: Bootstrap, Hexademical Coloring, Accessing the DOM, Integrating JS functionality into Basic Markdown.
